title: CBC Life
text:
Whether you're hosting a party at your lair or creeping out into the night on your own, your cat is all the inspiration you need this Halloween for the very best-BFF costume. Makeup artist Julia Dantas takes us through the easy steps of mimicking the hair and facial features of her little friend Lulu, an adorable tabby, whose sweet face she mimicked using mostly a single palette.

Watch Julia Dantas become Lulu for the greatest BFF costume of all. 6:06

These are the products Julia used for this hair and makeup tutorial:
